summary: A touching story of a soldier who doesn't understand how to live a peaceful life. Kinotaur 2004 Grand-prix and Golden Eagle Award for Best Director to Valery Todorovsky. 2004
cast: Leonid Yarmolnik|Daniil Spivakovskiy|Elena Yakovleva|Artyom Shalimov|Marianna Ilyina|Sergey Gazarov|Sergey Garmash|Elvira Danilina|Vladimir Bogdanov|Tatyana Shumova|Sergey Yakubenko|Darya Belousova|Anton Lutsenko|Yuliana Soldatova|Tatyana Zhdanova|Natalya Kochetova|Sergey Savenkov|Irina Tretyakova|Igor Sigov|Tatyana Garkusha|Irina Sapunova|Yelena Levchenko|Sergey Veshchyov|Ervin Gaaz|Dmitry Kozyrev|Sergey Dedok|Arina Artimovich|Timofey Tkachyov|Yury Kostov|Lyubov Anisimova|Irina Sokolova|Valery Kuznetsov|Irina Urbanovich|Tatyana Luzhanskaya|Igor Poleshchuk|Zhanna Yatsevich|Sergey Sosnovskiy
title: Moy svodnyy brat Frankenshteyn
